text: Pinkberry is a franchise of frozen dessert restaurants. It is headquartered in Scottsdale, Arizona. It has 260 stores in 20 countries. It was founded in January 2005 by Hye Kyung Hwang and Young Lee. ==References== == Other websites == *Official website *Official international website Category:American restaurants Category:Companies based in Arizona Category:2005 establishments in the United States
title: Pinkberry
